DOC.brief_summary: A prospective diagnostic clinical study randomise patient undergo endobronchial ultrasound guide transbronchial needle aspiration ( EBUS-TBNA ) enlarge mediastinal hilar lymph node sample use usual EBUS-TBNA needle novel biopsy forceps ( EBUS-TBNB ) . The study aim establish whether use EBUS-TBNB significantly increase diagnostic yield EBUS-TBNA , without increase complication rate .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled EBUSTBNA part clinical care Lymph nod large 10mm diameter Age > 18 year Able provide write informed consent Contraindications needle forceps biopsy ( e.g . coagulopathy , anticoagulation , thrombocytopenia ) Inability obtain informed consent
